      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  R2ShaderFilterVerifier<M>
      A verifier for filter shaders; a type that verifies that a renderer has called all of the required methods in the correct order.

      An emission shader that copies the emissive parts of an image.

      A shader that renders fog based on depth.
